game.name: Trading Card Shop Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In this business simulation game, you run a trading card shop and work to grow it into a successful store. Start with a few cards and buy, sell, or trade to attract customers and collectors. As the market changes, you’ll need to make smart choices, build your reputation to become the best card shop.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this business simulation game, you run a trading card shop and work to grow it into a successful store. Start with a few cards and buy, sell, or trade to attract customers and collectors. As the market changes, you’ll need to make smart choices, build your reputation to become the best card shop.
